Posts.Content: I have been cancer free for five  and a half months. I was on tamoxefen for two years and aromasin for three years.   I will continue with my aromasin until advised otherwise by my doctor. My problem is hair loss.  Does anyone out there  have  this problem?  Does anyone know what can help? I had sixr ounds of chemo in2002. My hair came back very thin.  It has gotten worst every year.  If anyone has any suggentions please  write.thanks bogey
Posts.Title: hair loss
